           int row,
           AI ai)
        Game method that processes a guess on a game board
        Parameters:
        col - the col index to be guessed
        row - the row index to be guessed
        ai - the Artificial Intelligence used to guess next spot

      • getNode

        javafx.scene.Node getNode(int col,
                          int row)
        GridPane's have no default way to retrieve a node by column and row indices. This method adds that functionality
        Parameters:
        col - the column index of the node
        row - the row index of the node
        Returns:
        the node we are looking for, or null if node is not found

      • isValid

        java.lang.Boolean isValid(int x,
                          int y,
                          int size,
                          boolean isRotated)
        Checks if boat placement is valid or not
        Parameters:
        x - the x index of the boat to place
        y - the y index of the boat to place
        size - the size of the boat to place
        Returns:
        true if placement is a valid spot, false otherwise
